articles.title: Japanese encephalitis - Sydney Southeast Asia Centre - University of Sydney
articles.description: The Japanese encephalitis virus has been detected in parts of Australia for the first time. But across much of Southeast Asia, the virus has long been a concern.
articles.content: As [JEV] is spread by mosquito vectors and is endemic to several parts of Asia and the Torres Strait region of Australia, we have long been concerned that it would inevitably arrive in Australia, as … [+2437 chars]

articles.title: Tom Holland’s ‘Uncharted’ Is Banned in Vietnam Over Illegal Map Images - Variety
articles.description: Popular on Variety Sony’s hit action adventure “Uncharted” has been banned in Vietnam over the film’s inclusion of a map that depicts China’s contested territorial claims in Southeast Asia. The film, which stars Tom Holland, Mark Walhberg and Antonio Banderas…

articles.author: Jeffrey Hutton (Regional Correspondent - The Straits Times)
articles.title: Cut off from family and savings, Russians on holiday in South-East Asia count the cost of war - The Star Online
articles.description: When he arrived in Bali nearly two weeks ago, after four days of quarantine in Jakarta, Viktor learnt that his adopted country of Russia had invaded his country of birth, Ukraine.
